element.definition: The value of the header e.g. "application/fhir+xml".
element.comment: If header element is specified, then value is required.  No conversions will be done by the test engine e.g. "xml" to "application/fhir+xml".  The values will be set in HTTP headers "as-is".  Test engines do have to look for placeholders (${}) and replace the variable placeholders with the variable values at runtime before sending the request.
